column2: Announcements are a great way to keep your members engaged in the community. Announcements appear inside the "Announcement Widget", which you can place anywhere on your site. By default, this widget appears at the top of the member homepage - this way, members see your announcements right when they sign in. You can move this widget elsewhere or change its settings in the Layout Editor.
